entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16.
